list.abs: the nonsmoking section of a restaurant ., 餐馆中的无烟区.
aisle n. 通道，走廊nonsmoking section 不抽烟区satellite hall 卫星厅

entry.def: A non-smoker is someone who does not smoke.

example.ex: Nobody will be allowed to smoke in an office if there are non-smokers present.
example.tran: 如果有不吸烟的人在场，任何人不得在办公室吸烟。

means.word_mean: 1. a person who does not smoke tobacco
2. a passenger car for passengers who want to avoid tobacco smoke

auth_sentence.content: He described himself as a teetotaller and a nonsmoker all his life.
auth_sentence.res_content: He described himself as a teetotaller and a nonsmoker all his life.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He described himself as a teetotaller and a nonsmoker all his life.

auth_sentence.content: But as a nonsmoker, I wonder just where else this polonium may lie.
auth_sentence.res_content: But as a nonsmoker, I wonder just where else this polonium may lie.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But as a nonsmoker, I wonder just where else this polonium may lie.

auth_sentence.content: Take the case of Beverly Sotir, a nonsmoker diagnosed with advanced, non-small cell lung cancer several years ago.
auth_sentence.res_content: Take the case of Beverly Sotir, a nonsmoker diagnosed with advanced, non-small cell lung cancer several years ago.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Take the case of Beverly Sotir, a nonsmoker diagnosed with advanced, non-small cell lung cancer several years ago.

sentences.en: Nonsmokers should avoid being in smoke-filled rooms.
sentences.cn: 不吸烟者应该避免呆在烟雾弥漫的房间里。
